Text:
Ausio goes out of sync on this one. Not sure if it's the copy or my computer being stupid. Closing and reopening the video worked a couple of times.

Otherwise, great quality, audio and visual both pretty solid.

yep it goes out of sync in the last segment on
last ad break..

I fixed it in my convert to xvid though
Audio is way out of sync.
String of out of sync videos. I wonder what is causing it. May be everyone is just off there game

Agreed, it's out of sync on mine at the end as well. Seeing as the last episode of Eureka I got from eztv had similar sync issues, I'm beginning to wonder if this is a sign that the quality of their downloads is going downhill.
i agree audio is out of sync towards the end otherwise watchable but a little annoying :-(
He uploaded a fixed version later in the day, he added proper to the name to differentiate the two.
